channel.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
channel.description:
I made these two images in GIMP since I don't have photoshop, so the font & format is wrong but it still shows the abilities of these two classes
https://imgur.com/a/CATTqRk EDIT: Removed occupy/redirect immunity passive
> # [color=#49a2fc] The Spiritualist [/color] > > [color=#49a2fc]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] > > **Crystal Ball (Day)** : You will learn if target player used a day ability at the end of the night. > > **Seance (Night):** Recieve the last feedback of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer/BD Social classes, or the King. Can only use each dead BD member once. Does not count as a visit. > **Last Rites (Night):** Perform the primary action of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer classes, except Knight. Each dead BD member can only be used once.
> # [color=purple] The Necromancer [/color] > > [color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] > > **Dark Arts (Day):** Secretly prevent your target from using day abilities for the rest of the day. Cannot target King. > > **Raise Dead (Night):** Perform the primary action of any dead non-killer class. Cannot be used on the Mastermind or the King, but can be used on a Knight. Dead players can be used infinitely. > **Grave Silence (Night):** Any messages sent by this player today will be hidden to the public, and will be whispered to you. The targeted player will not be aware of this effect. Cannot target King.
Ability feedback for Spiritualist:
> Crystal Ball: > - Tonight, you will learn if (player) [x] used a day ability today. > - (player) [x] used/did not use a day ability yesterday. > > Seance: > Say that 8 is a Princess, who flirted 13 on the night they (8) died. > - You will perform a seance with (player) [8] tonight. > - (player) [13] is a Killer or Offensive class. > or, > - (player) [8] did not receive any feedback on the night they died. (they were occupied/hit jail/were a poss jump) > > Last Rites: > You select two targets, the first being the dead BD member, and the second being the alive player you want to target. > Lets say that 7 is a dead Butler, and you want to occupy 10. > - You will serve wine to (player) [10] tonight. > - You occupied them/they were occupy immune. > You will receive this feedback even if the targeted BD member was a Possessor jump, and the targeted player will not be occupied in this case. > Also, you will be shown to visit the second target of Last Rites (the alive one)
Ability feedback for Necromancer:
> Dark Arts: > - (player) [x] will be prevented from using day abilities today. > > Raise Dead: > Same feedback and rules as Last Rites. (except for use of non-BD members and infinite use as opposed to one-time use) > > Grave Silence: > - All messages sent by (player) [x] will be whispered to you tomorrow.

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
Later today or tomorrow I’ll update the OP and the class card image so that it answers all the questions made here so that people don’t have to trawl through the whole thread

Also considering changing the description so that if a dead class visits two people for their primary ability, you will instead use their second ability.

Read full topic

Can be used on a knight, knight is just an exclusion from the unusable killer classes
(just clarifying, not trying to be rude :P)

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
katze:

okay but

if i notice everything i said is being ignored

i think id note this in my nightlogs

or do the ToS blackmailer spam voting thing

Marshal:

or just say “hey _____ can you see my whisper?”

Grave Silence outing a Necromancer is fine imo, just as Illusionist using blur outs them as Illusionist. Both should typically fake claim if they are converted before outing. (Necro can just not use Grave Silence)

Read full topic

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
can this target king?

I’m not sure if it can target King, and it seems like it would be not possible to “secretly” cause point/DF to fail, so probably not.

this probably would be hard to code and would also kind of out that a necromancer exists if a bit of common sense is in play

Grave Silence whispers are also hidden to the public, but it can out that a necromancer exists.

Read full topic
item.source: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
How does this interact with Possessor/Herbalist?

When using seance, you will get “- (player) [8] did not receive any feedback on the night they died. (they were occupied/hit jail/were a poss jump)”

For last rites/raise dead, you will receive the ability use feedback even if the targeted BD member was a Possessor jump. (i.e. you use a Butler, it will tell you that you occupied x when you didn’t, because it was a possessor jump/herbalist defile/scorned disguise)
I’m thinking that maybe Necromancer could get a passive where they know the true classes of flips

Read full topic

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
anyway my immediate feedback would be

katze:

Medium (Passive): Immune to occupy and redirect

not sure if this is necessary

katze:

Seance (Night): Recieve the last feedback of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer/BD Social classes

i don’t see any reason this can’t be used on a noble gossip tbh

katze:

Dark Acts (Day): Secretly prevent your target from using day abilities for the rest of the day.

i can’t tell if this is potentially too strong or not but i want to comment it out to see what others think

can this target king?

katze:

Last Rites (Night): Perform the primary action of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer classes, except Knight.

this might be funky with 2 target abilities and hard to code in any case

katze:

Grave Silence (Night): Any messages sent by this player today will be hidden to the public, and will be whispered to you. The targeted player will not be aware of this effect.

this probably would be hard to code and would also kind of out that a necromancer exists if a bit of common sense is in play

Read full topic

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
Maybe if spiritualist wasn’t occupy immune, then it would be easier to counter. Originally I had the occupy/redirect immunity because both of Spiritualist’s day abilities didn’t count as visiting, but I changed it so that just Seance didn’t count as visiting.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
“(Each dead BD member can only be used once as Spiritualist)”

Only once as spiritualist, infinite if Necromancer (necro can use primary of neutrals/other dead converts).

Also, sorry for not using the class card I’m new to the forums

Read full topic

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Anyways, I think there is value in being able to kill off classes that have abilities you don’t want to have to deal with

This class being able to bring them back from beyond the grave seems to kinda counter that idea

Read full topic

item.source: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
also i made em into the classcards we usually use here for convenience sake

The Spiritualist

Blue Dragon Social
Medium (Passive): Immune to occupy and redirect

Crystal Ball (Day): You will learn if target player used a day ability at the end of the night.

Seance (Night): Recieve the last feedback of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer/BD Social classes. Does not count as a visit.
Last Rites (Night): Perform the primary action of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer classes, except Knight.

The Necromancer

Unseen Social
Medium (Passive): Immune to occupy and redirect

Dark Arts (Day): Secretly prevent your target from using day abilities for the rest of the day.

Raise Dead (Night): Perform the primary action of any dead non-killer class. Cannot be used on the Mastermind, but can be used on a Knight.
Grave Silence (Night): Any messages sent by this player today will be hidden to the public, and will be whispered to you. The targeted player will not be aware of this effect.

raw text for the above classcards in case you want to repost this for any reason 
> **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]**
> **Medium (Passive):** Immune to occupy and redirect
> 
> **Crystal Ball (Day)**: You will learn if target player used a day ability at the end of the night.
> 
> **Seance (Night):** Recieve the last feedback of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer/BD Social classes. Does not count as a visit.
> **Last Rites (Night):** Perform the primary action of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer classes, except Knight. 

> # [color=purple]The Necromancer[/color]
> **[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]**
> **Medium (Passive):** Immune to occupy and redirect
>
>**Dark Arts (Day):** Secretly prevent your target from using day abilities for the rest of the day.
>
>**Raise Dead (Night):** Perform the primary action of any dead non-killer class. Cannot be used on the Mastermind, but can be used on a Knight. 
>**Grave Silence (Night):** Any messages sent by this player today will be hidden to the public, and will be whispered to you. The targeted player will not be aware of this effect. ```

Read full topic
item.source: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)

If so, infinite occ/red immune Knight guards on Prince lul

Read full topic
item.source: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)

item.title: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: _torino
item.description:
I made these two images in GIMP since I don’t have photoshop, so the font & format is wrong but it still shows the abilities of these two classes

https://imgur.com/a/CATTqRk
EDIT: Removed occupy/redirect immunity passive

The Spiritualist

Blue Dragon Social

Crystal Ball (Day) : You will learn if target player used a day ability at the end of the night.

Seance (Night): Recieve the last feedback of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer/BD Social classes, or the King. Can only use each dead BD member once. Does not count as a visit.
Last Rites (Night): Perform the primary action of a dead Blue Dragon member. Can not be used on BD Killer classes, except Knight. Each dead BD member can only be used once.

The Necromancer

Unseen Social

Dark Arts (Day): Secretly prevent your target from using day abilities for the rest of the day. Cannot target King.

Raise Dead (Night): Perform the primary action of any dead non-killer class. Cannot be used on the Mastermind or the King, but can be used on a Knight. Dead players can be used infinitely.
Grave Silence (Night): Any messages sent by this player today will be hidden to the public, and will be whispered to you. The targeted player will not be aware of this effect. Cannot target King.

Ability feedback for Spiritualist:

Crystal Ball:

  • Tonight, you will learn if (player) [x] used a day ability today.
  • (player) [x] used/did not use a day ability yesterday.

Seance:
Say that 8 is a Princess, who flirted 13 on the night they (8) died.

  • You will perform a seance with (player) [8] tonight.
  • (player) [13] is a Killer or Offensive class.
    or,
  • (player) [8] did not receive any feedback on the night they died. (they were occupied/hit jail/were a poss jump)

Last Rites:
You select two targets, the first being the dead BD member, and the second being the alive player you want to target.
Lets say that 7 is a dead Butler, and you want to occupy 10.

  • You will serve wine to (player) [10] tonight.
  • You occupied them/they were occupy immune.
    You will receive this feedback even if the targeted BD member was a Possessor jump, and the targeted player will not be occupied in this case.
    Also, you will be shown to visit the second target of Last Rites (the alive one)

Ability feedback for Necromancer:

Dark Arts:
- (player) [x] will be prevented from using day abilities today.

Raise Dead:
Same feedback and rules as Last Rites. (except for use of non-BD members and infinite use as opposed to one-time use)

Grave Silence:
- All messages sent by (player) [x] will be whispered to you tomorrow.

Read full topic
item.source: The Spiritualist (BD Social) & The Necromancer (Unseen Social)
